requireSlotRecapParagraph:
Thanks for you reservation, here is a summary of your booking. Your booking is waiting for slot confirmation.

You will receive an email once the slot is confirmed.
confirmedRecapParagraph: Thanks for you reservation, here is a summary of your booking. Your booking is confirmed.
bookingSlotUpdatedParagraph: The slot of your booking has changed. Here is a new summary of your updated booking.
slotRequestAcceptedParagraph: Your booking has been confirmed. Here is a summary of your booking.
slotRequestRejectedParagraph: Your booking has been declined. You won't be charged for this booking.
bookingCanceledParagraph: Your booking has been canceled. You won't be charged for this booking.
requestSlotAdminParagraphNotice: You just received slot request {count} participants. Here is a summary of the slot request.
adminMailparagraphNotice: You just received a new booking for {count} participants. Here is a summary of the booking.
sms: This is a booking reminder. You have a reservation on ${date} at ${hour} for ${participantNumber} persons with ${companyName}.
email_client_title: You made a reservation for {participantNumber} persons to {companyName}
email_company_title: You received a reservation for {participantNumber} persons
